entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:34 a.m. PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 10:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: S 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 14. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
